profile.name: Surya Kumar M
profile.title: Full Stack Developer
profile.bio: Passionate about building modern web applications with cutting-edge technologies. Transforming ideas into elegant, scalable solutions.

education.institution: KSR Institute for Engineering and Technology, Tiruchengode
education.description: Pursuing B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering with focus on Full Stack Development, AI, and modern web technologies.

internships.description: Working as a Full Stack Developer, building modern web applications using React, Node.js, and various databases. Implementing secure authentication, RESTful APIs, and deploying applications on cloud platforms.
Completed intensive training in Full Stack Development, learning modern web technologies, database management, and deployment strategies.

certificates.title: Java (Basic)
certificates.description: Basic Java programming certification from HackerRank

certificates.title: Fundamentals of Responsive Generative AI
certificates.description: Microsoft certification on Generative AI fundamentals and responsive AI systems

certificates.title: Learnathon 2024
certificates.description: Participated in Learnathon 2024 organized by ICT Academy

projects.title: Online Petition Management System
projects.description: A secure full-stack petition platform with multilingual UI and analytics
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive petition management system using React, Node.js, and MySQL. Features include JWT authentication, file uploads, multilingual user interface, real-time analytics dashboard, and secure data management. Successfully deployed on Render (backend) and Vercel (frontend).
projects.challenges: Implementing secure authentication, handling file uploads efficiently, and creating a scalable analytics system for real-time petition tracking.

projects.title: User Management System
projects.description: Full-stack web application for secure user management
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive user management system with secure registration, login, and CRUD-based profile management. Built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript for frontend and Node.js, Express, MySQL for backend. Implements best practices for security and data validation.
projects.challenges: Implementing secure password hashing, session management, and ensuring data validation on both client and server side.

projects.title: Hospital Management System
projects.description: Full-stack hospital management application with React and MongoDB
projects.longDescription: Built a comprehensive hospital management system using React.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Features include patient management, appointment scheduling, doctor management, and medical records. Frontend deployed on Vercel, backend on Render, and database on MongoDB Atlas.
projects.challenges: Managing complex relationships between patients, doctors, and appointments. Ensuring data security and HIPAA compliance considerations.

projects.title: Auto WhatsApp Reminder AI
projects.description: AI-powered automated WhatsApp reminder system with smart login
projects.longDescription: Developed an intelligent WhatsApp reminder system using full-stack development with AI integration. Features an AI-generated login page with smart authentication. The system automatically sends reminders via WhatsApp based on scheduled events, appointments, or custom triggers. Utilizes AI for natural language processing, smart scheduling, and secure user authentication.
projects.challenges: Integrating WhatsApp API, implementing AI for intelligent scheduling and login page generation, and ensuring reliable message delivery across different time zones.

projects.title: Smart Irrigation System using ARIMAX Model
projects.description: AI-powered irrigation system with predictive analytics using ARIMAX model
projects.longDescription: Developed an intelligent irrigation system that uses the ARIMAX (AutoRegressive Integrated Moving Average with eXogenous variables) model to predict optimal watering schedules. The system analyzes weather patterns, soil moisture, temperature, and humidity data to automate irrigation, reducing water waste and improving crop yield. Built with Python, FastAPI, and IoT sensor integration.
projects.challenges: Training the ARIMAX model with limited historical data, integrating IoT sensors for real-time monitoring, and ensuring system reliability in varying weather conditions.

projects.title: API Trichy Chapter - Official Website
projects.description: Complete digital platform for API Tiruchirappalli Chapter physicians
projects.longDescription: Proud to launch the official full-stack website for API Tiruchirappalli Chapter - a modern, elegant, information-rich hub for doctors with events, CME programs, publications, leadership details, media content, and member engagement features. Built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, and Prisma ORM.
features: Premium UI with custom API Trichy branding
Home with hero, quick links, upcoming events
About Us - Chapter history and mission
projects.challenges: Building a comprehensive CMS with role-based access control, managing multiple content types (events, publications, media), and creating an elegant medical-themed UI that appeals to physicians.

projects.title: ISC Textile Report App - Digital Printing Management
projects.description: Digital textile printing & production management system for Indian Soft Colours
projects.longDescription: Built for client Indian Soft Colours (ISC) - Mr. P. Baskaran. A fully digital textile printing & production management system that replaces manual registers with real-time tracking, reporting, analytics, and export capabilities. Optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop with PWA support for offline access.
features: Smart Record Management - Add, Edit, Delete with confirmation
Search, sort & filter by date ranges (Today, Week, Month, Custom)
Detailed data fields: Date, Party DC No, Padding DC No, Party Name, Fabric Quality, Party Mtr, Padding Mtr, Short/Excess Mtr, Print Mtr, Outward Mtr, Balance
Dashboard & Analytics with total records, meters, and live metrics
Color-coded metrics and recent activity feed
PDF Export with auto-formatted tables, company logo, portrait/landscape modes, page numbering
Excel Export with clean spreadsheets compatible with MS Excel & Google Sheets
PWA - Installable on Android, iPhone, Windows, macOS
projects.challenges: Transforming paper-based textile workflow into a digital system, implementing complex PDF/Excel export with custom formatting, ensuring offline functionality with PWA, and creating an intuitive UI for non-technical textile workers.

projects.title: MedFoxRCM - Healthcare Revenue Cycle Management Platform
projects.description: Fully responsive Healthcare RCM website with medical coding course registration system
projects.longDescription: MedFoxRCM is a fully responsive and production-ready Healthcare RCM website built with Next.js 14. It combines business service presentation with a complete medical coding course registration system. Features modern UI/UX with brand-based theming, animations, and secure email automation for course registrations.
features: Modern UI/UX with brand-based theming & animations
RCM service modules: Medical Billing, Coding & Audit, Consulting
Fully responsive design for mobile, tablet & desktop
projects.challenges: Creating a professional healthcare industry website that combines service presentation with a functional course registration system, implementing secure email automation, and ensuring HIPAA-compliant design considerations.
